post:

ErrantWeb offers great custom quote options. If you are interested in getting a server to fit your needs please reply to this post with the exact specs that you want or email us at: sales@errantweb.com we will get back to you within 24 hours with a price for what you want.

Thanks for allowing us to offer this!
